heroSubtitle: Real results for real businesses — see how we've helped organisations like yours
intro: We don't just talk about what we can do — we show it. These case studies demonstrate how Quantum Harbour has transformed IT operations for businesses across Ireland and the UK.

caseStudies.title: Keeping J Ryan Haulage Online with High-Availability Infrastructure
caseStudies.summary: Phased takeover of a two-site haulage operation, implementing high-availability servers and disaster recovery infrastructure in Germany to ensure business continuity.
caseStudies.challenge: J Ryan Haulage operates a critical transport operation across two sites with 105 users. Their existing IT infrastructure was fragile, with single points of failure throughout. Any significant downtime would halt deliveries, damage customer relationships, and directly impact revenue. They needed a partner who could stabilise their systems while planning for growth.
approach: Conducted comprehensive IT audit across both sites to identify critical vulnerabilities
Implemented phased migration to avoid business disruption during transition
Deployed high-availability server infrastructure with automatic failover
Established disaster recovery replication to German data centre
Rolled out standardised endpoint protection and patch management
Created documented procedures and runbooks for common scenarios

testimonial.quote: Quantum Harbour transformed our IT from a constant worry into something we barely have to think about. The HA setup means we've had zero unplanned outages since they took over.
testimonial.author: Operations Manager, J Ryan Haulage

caseStudies.title: HIPAA-Compliant Infrastructure for Westside Medical Centre
caseStudies.summary: Complete security overhaul for a busy medical practice, achieving full compliance with healthcare data protection requirements while improving day-to-day operations.
caseStudies.challenge: Westside Medical Centre handles sensitive patient data daily across multiple practitioners. Their legacy systems weren't meeting modern compliance requirements, staff security awareness was low, and they had no tested backup or recovery procedures. An audit was looming and they needed to act fast.
approach: Performed gap analysis against healthcare compliance frameworks
Implemented encrypted backup solution with verified restore testing
Deployed advanced endpoint protection with healthcare-specific policies
Rolled out mandatory security awareness training for all staff
Established identity and access management procedures
Created compliance documentation and audit trail systems

testimonial.quote: We went from dreading our compliance audit to passing with flying colours. The staff training made a huge difference — everyone understands why security matters now.
testimonial.author: Practice Manager, Westside Medical Centre

caseStudies.title: Cloud-First Transformation for Atlantic Logistics
caseStudies.summary: Migration from aging on-premise infrastructure to a modern cloud-first architecture, enabling remote work capabilities and dramatic cost savings.
caseStudies.challenge: Atlantic Logistics was running critical systems on aging servers that were increasingly expensive to maintain and impossible to access remotely. The COVID-19 pandemic exposed their lack of remote work capability, and hardware refresh costs were becoming prohibitive.
approach: Audited existing workloads and categorised migration complexity
Designed hybrid cloud architecture balancing cost and performance
Executed phased migration with rollback capability at each stage
Implemented cloud-native backup and disaster recovery
Deployed secure remote access for all staff
Established ongoing optimisation and cost monitoring

testimonial.quote: The cloud migration paid for itself within 18 months. More importantly, when we needed everyone working from home, it just worked.
testimonial.author: Managing Director, Atlantic Logistics
